description: This is Behind the Blog, where we share our behind-the-scenes thoughts about how a few of our top stories of the week came together. This week, we discuss feeling like a hamster on a treadmill, reporting that leads to real-life change, and reflecting on protest.
title: Behind the Blog: Protests and Real-Life Repercussions

description: After 404 Media reported on the service last week, Discord has now shut down a mass of scraping accounts and says it is considering legal action.
title: Discord Shuts Down ‘Spy Pet’ Bots That Scraped, Sold User Messages
